name: Cirrata
description:
A Metroidvania/Roguelite style indie video game. The game is about Keir, an anthropomorphic red panda who also happens to be a chef. Inspired by the popular console games of the 90's.
​
Explore the surroundings of a mysterious town inhabited by anthropomorphic frogs to prepare yourself for battle.

Use your abilities and weapons to defeat waves of enemies and become stronger.

Take on boss fights to become even stronger and earn a reputation to spark interest in the world of Cirrata.

Grow the pub in town and learn what people from all over can contribute to the fight.



​
cirrata is in very early development.
